document.heading: District of Columbia Poverty Lawyer Loan Assistance Repayment Program Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-203, the “District of Columbia Poverty Lawyer Loan Assistance Repayment Program Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-660, which was referred to the Committee on Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 11, 2006, and October 3, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 25, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-503 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-203 became effective on March 2, 2007.
